description: You can earn this currency by completing tasks. You can exchange them at any Tasks Master for a reward.
name: Tasks Coin

description: Use the item to receive 2500 gold.
name: Bag of Gold

description: Use the item to receive 1000 gold.
name: Small Bag of Gold

description: Use the item to teleport you to the spawn.
name: Recall Potion

description: Use the item to teleport you to the south bank.
name: South Bank Potion

description: Restores 20HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.
name: Small Health Potion

description: Increase your inventory space by 15.
name: Satchel

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character mines a resource.
name: Iron Pickaxe

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character logs a tree.
name: Iron Axe

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character is fishing.
name: Spruce Fishing Rod

description: Increase your inventory space by 35.
name: Backpack

description: Gives 12% earth damage at the start of fight.
name: Earth Boost Potion

description: Gives 12% air damage at the start of fight.
name: Air Boost Potion

description: Gives 12% fire damage at the start of fight.
name: Fire Boost Potion

description: Gives 12% water damage at the start of fight.
name: Water Boost Potion

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character harvest a plant.
name: Leather Gloves

description: Restores 40HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.
name: Minor Health Potion

description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes 20 poison damage.
name: Small Antidote

description: Restores 10% of the total attack of all elements in HP after a critical strike.
name: Lifesteal Rune

description: On your first turn, apply a burn effect of 20% of your attack of all elements. The damage is applied each turn and decreases by 10% each time. It is impossible to block.
name: Burn Rune

description: Every 3 played turns, restores 5% of HP at the start of the turn.
name: Healing Rune

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character mines a resource.
name: Rock Egg

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character harvest a plant.
name: Plant Egg

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character logs a tree.
name: Wooden Egg

description: Reduces cooldown by 10% when a character is fishing.
name: Fish Egg

description: Reduces cooldown by 20% when a character is fishing.
name: Gold Fishing Rod

description: Reduces cooldown by 20% when a character logs a tree.
name: Gold Axe

description: Reduces cooldown by 20% when a character mines a resource.
name: Gold Pickaxe

description: Restores 60HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.
name: Health Potion

description: Reduces cooldown by 20% when a character harvest a plant.
name: Golden Gloves

description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes 50 poison damage.
name: Antidote

description: Restores 80HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.
name: Greater Health Potion

description: Commemorative weapon in honor of Rosenstjerne. First player to drop an artifact in the game.
name: Sanguine Edge of Rosen

description: Gives 20% resistance in all elements at the start of fight.
name: Rosenblood Elixir

description: Gives 150HP at the start of the fight.
name: Health Boost Potion

description: Restores 100HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.
name: Enchanted Health Potion

description: Gives 20% damage in all elements at the start of fight.

description: Gives 10% earth resistance at the start of fight.

description: Gives 10% fire resistance at the start of fight.
